document.full_text: tpg capital has agreed to acquire primedia in a deal valued at $525 million including debt, finally unwinding k.k.r.'s investment in the company.
document.title: after 22 years, k.k.r. is exiting primedia
lines_and_colors: tpg capital has agreed to acquire primedia in a deal valued at $525 million including debt, finally unwinding k.k.r.'s investment in the company.
